alert.note: Alert for Erie (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 20 at 1:54PM EDT until July 20 at 2:45PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN ERIE COUNTY... At 153 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Northwest Harborcreek, or 9 miles northeast of Erie, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... North East, Northwest Harborcreek, Harborcreek and Lawrence Park. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Lightning can strike out to 15 miles from the parent thunderstorm. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Move to safe shelter now! Do not be caught on the water in a thunderstorm.
